医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
先进技术揭示了 plectasin 对细菌的类似尼龙搭扣的作用一种名为菌丝素的小型抗生素采用创新机制来杀死细菌。通过组装成大型结构，plectasin 锁定在细菌细胞表面的目标上，类似于 Velcro 两侧形成粘合的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240525/Advanced-techniques-reveal-plectasins-velcro-like-action-against-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240525/Advanced-techniques-reveal-plectasins-velcro-like-action-against-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be89ccc4-3c0e-4c51-baa9-3d1b45753504 Sat, 25 May 2024 00:18:08 -0400 Advanced techniques reveal plectasin's velcro-like action against bacteria
评估肝硬化患者急性门静脉血栓的全身溶栓治疗门静脉血栓（PVT）的患病率在肝病的不同阶段存在显着差异：代偿期患者为10​​%，失代偿期患者为17%，急性失代偿性肝硬化患者为9%，肝移植后患者为2-26% 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Evaluating-systemic-thrombothesis-for-acute-portal-vein-thrombosis-in-cirrotic-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Evaluating-systemic-thrombosis-for-acute-portal-vein-thrombosis-in-cirrhotic-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6395c8e2-e8da-48cf-a94e-2cdce0ec59df Fri, 24 May 2024 13:19:00 -0400 Evaluating systemic thrombolysis for acute portal vein thrombosis in cirrhotic patients
两项新研究提供了对神经精神疾病分子生物学的见解在美国国立卫生研究院于 2015 年建立的精神健康研究项目 PsychENCODE 联盟的保护下，西奈山科学家团队通过发表在特别期刊上的两项新研究，发现了关于神经精神疾病分子生物学的重要新见解。 《科学》杂志，5 月 24 日星期五。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Two-new-studies-offer-insights-into-the-molecular-biology-of-neuropsychiatric-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Two-new-studies-offer-insights-into-the-molecular-biology-of-neuropsychiatric-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b9796c6-b606-4776-a27c-71731655558b Fri, 24 May 2024 13:11:00 -0400 Two new studies offer insights into the molecular biology of neuropsychiatric disease
研究人员绘制了大脑中基因调控网络的先进多维图一个研究人员联盟绘制了患有和没有精神障碍的人大脑中最大、最先进的基因调控网络多维图谱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Researchers-product-advanced-multiDimension-maps-of-gene-regulation-networks-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Researchers-product-advanced-multiDimension-maps-of-gene-regulation-networks-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa08614a-7dfa-459a-ac9e-19ddf9ee2fed Fri, 24 May 2024 13:00:27 -0400 Researchers produce advanced multidimensional maps of gene regulation networks in the brain
开发了两种分析方法来分析蔬菜和蚯蚓中的几种抗生素UPV/EHU 研究员 Irantzu Vergara 成功同时分析了蔬菜和蚯蚓中的几个抗生素家族。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Two-analytical-methods-development-to-analyze-several-antibiotics-in-vegetables-and-earthworms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Two-analytical-methods-development-to-analyze-several-antibiotics-in-vegetables-and-earthworms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20d8733b-4fa4-489a-a93c-fa758b837566 Fri, 24 May 2024 12:56:26 -0400 Two analytical methods developed to analyze several antibiotics in vegetables and earthworms
彻底改变神经学研究：巴罗神经分析中心在凤凰城开业巴罗神经学研究所开设了一个新的尖端研究中心，预计将彻底改变神经学研究，并将凤凰城的研究足迹扩展到环境神经学和健康公平领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Revolutionizing-neurological-research-Barrow-Neuro-Analytics-Center-opens-in-Phoenix.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Revolutionizing-neurological-research-Barrow-Neuro-Analytics-Center-opens-in-Phoenix.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9603bc11-a840-4ad8-91ed-f32dd5939fde Fri, 24 May 2024 12:45:55 -0400 Revolutionizing neurological research: Barrow Neuro Analytics Center opens in Phoenix
免疫疗法-化疗组合可提高转移性​​结直肠癌患者的生存率加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心 Jonsson 综合癌症中心研究人员领导的一项研究发现，与接受过标准化疗的转移性结直肠癌患者相比，联合使用实验性免疫治疗药物与化疗可显着提高无进展生存期和总生存期。单独靶向治疗瑞戈非尼。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Immunotherapy-chemotherapy-combo-boosts-survival-for-病人-with-metastatic-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Immunotherapy-chemotherapy-combo-boosts-survival-for-病人-with-metastatic-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd7e6d6c-803d-42f6-aa68-d0540ebce5bd Fri, 24 May 2024 12:39:13 -0400 Immunotherapy-chemotherapy combo boosts survival for patients with metastatic colorectal cancer
EBC-129 的 1 期试验进展到剂量扩展新加坡国家药物发现和开发平台实验药物开发中心 (EDDC) 很高兴地宣布，EBC-129 的一期试验已进入剂量扩展阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Phase-1-trial-for-EBC-129-progresses-into-dose-expansion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Phase-1-trial-for-EBC-129-progresses-into-dose-expansion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e569293b-2881-4e05-b3e2-af935be33a12 Fri, 24 May 2024 12:32:24 -0400 Phase 1 trial for EBC-129 progresses into dose expansion
新的小分子为对抗抗生素耐药性带来了希望牛津大学的研究人员开发出一种新的小分子，可以抑制细菌中抗生素耐药性的进化，使耐药细菌对抗生素更敏感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/New-small-molecule-offers-hope-in​​-combating-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/New-small-molecule-offers-hope-in​​-combating-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a53b69b-276e-416f-a7ca-6f6869c1eb4e Fri, 24 May 2024 12:27:33 -0400 New small molecule offers hope in combating antibiotic resistance
高科技成像和 VR 用于绘制大脑图并了解发育障碍通过高科技成像和虚拟现实，南佛罗里达大学医学工程教授正在创建详细的大脑地图，可用于更好地了解自闭症等发育障碍，并为脑损伤和脑损伤提供更早、更有效的治疗。疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/High-tech-imaging-and-VR-used-for-mapping-the-brain-and-understanding-developmental-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/High-tech-imaging-and-VR-used-for-mapping-the-brain-and-understanding-developmental-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=674698d9-5673-49c4-8401-967546a9a02c Fri, 24 May 2024 10:22:27 -0400 High-tech imaging and VR used for mapping the brain and understanding developmental disorders
